author: billh
msg: Modified Files:
xml-batik/build.xml  : added check for deprecated APIs to compile target.
xml-batik/sources/org/apache/batik/apps/svgviewer/ViewerFrame.java  :
PARTIAL fix to thread problem: removed use of thread.stop(),
which was causing some hangs and other troubles.
At the moment the thread will not stop until it has
completed I/O,
TODO: make document loaders that catch IOExceptions do cleanup
and rethrow them, then use thread.interrupt().

author: deweese
msg: Holds utilities for printing image data to console or poping up windows with
Image in them.  Very useful for debugging

author: deweese
msg: Fixed two bugs with resolution handling:
1) GaussianBlurRable was growing the AOI in device space not user space.
2) FilterResRable was determining the new "device space" based on the AOI
intersected with the imageRect. It now only uses the imageRect this
now allows me to zoom in to the point where the renderer dies due to
floating point underflow in the JDK's renderer. :)
